TextBody:
Hi Leonardo,

Unfortunately I'm not available today.
If you wish, you can install it yourself, just co to Dashboard -> Live Update -> Check Now -> Select the hotfix -> click Apply Updates -> after it's done check View Applied EPP Software Updates to see it it was correctly applied:


Best regards,
Botond Biro | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
